text: [Music]
hello I'm Jared a customer service
specialist at the AWS office in Dublin
today I'll show you the different
payment methods that AWS accepts across
various AWS seller accounts let's get
started AWS provides a lot of
flexibility when choosing your payment
options you manage payment types from
the payment methods page which can be
found in the preferences section of the
AWS billing console note that payment
options can vary somewhat depending on
your geographic
location the accepted payment methods
depend on the AWS seller of record for
your
account you can find the name of your
AWS seller of record on your
invoice to check what payment methods
are available to your seller of record
click on payment preferences on your
billing console and select add payment
method the available payment methods for
you this will vary depending on your
seller of record also note when you
select credit card all available
accepted credit cards for your seller of
record will
appear prepaid credit and debit cards
are an accepted payment method however
the accepted credit card issuers depend
on your seller and record also if you
use a prepaid card it's best practice
not to r on it as your default payment
method as the card balance running out
could leave to failed payments and
potential account
suspension let's go through some
accepted payment methods by AWS sellic
record for AWS Inc and AWS Marketplace
accounts the following payment methods
are accepted credit and debit cards
issued by Visa Mastercard American
Express discover Diner Club at
JCB China union pay credit cards AC
direct debit payments for qualifying
customers
for AWS Europe and AWS Marketplace Amia
accounts the following payment methods
are
accepted credit and debit cards issued
by Visa Mastercard or American Express
DEA and a direct debit payments for
qualifying customers to get started with
a or separate direct debit both of these
programs require that you have paid at
least one invoice in full in the past 12
months and that you have paid at least a
total of $100
AC requires payments to be processed in
US Dollars and sepa requires payments to
be processed in Euros various credit and
debit cards are accepted such as
MasterCard American Express and in some
cases local card providers for these
additional seller accounts
AWS AWS South Africa AWS Korea AWS
Singapore AWS New Zealand aw WS
Australia AWS Canada AWS Japan AWS India
AWS
Malaysia and AWS
turkey Amazon gift cards and PayPal are
not accepted payment methods for AWS
Services if you have any further
questions on payment methods or what
payment methods are available to you
please open up a support case with AWS
customer service by clicking on the
support center on your console and
selecting accountant billing and that's
how you pay your AWS Bill using the
various accepted payment methods thanks
for watching and happy cloud computing
from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
